## Writable interface

Builds on top of [Readable](./ngx-tansu.readable.md) and represents a store that can be manipulated from "outside": anyone with a reference to writable store can either update or completely replace state of a given store.

```typescript
// reset counter's store value to 0 by using the {@link Writable.set} method
counterStore.set(0);

// increment counter's store value by using the {@link Writable.update} method
counterStore.update(currentValue => currentValue + 1);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Writable<T> extends Readable<T> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Readable](./ngx-tansu.readable.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [set(value)](./ngx-tansu.writable.set.md) | Replaces store's state with the provided value. |
|  [update(updater)](./ngx-tansu.writable.update.md) | Updates store's state by using an [Updater](./ngx-tansu.updater.md) function. |
